Translations.Text: And We did certainly send Noah to his people. And he said, "O my people! Worship Allah, you have no god other than Him. Will you not then fear Him

And then the leaders of those who suppressed the Truth from among his people said, "He is nothing but a man, like you. He desires to gain superiority over you. And if Allah had willed, He could certainly have sent down angels. We have not heard of such a thing happening during our forefathers' time
He is just a mad man. So keep a watch over him for some time
He said, "My Lord! Help me; for, they have rejected me

We then revealed our instructions to him: "Build the Ark under Our supervision and revealed instructions. And when, at Our command, the surface of the earth starts overflowing with water, put into it (Ark) two of every pair, and members of your family, except those among them against whom the Word (Allah's decree) has already been issued. And do not plead with Me on behalf of those who are cruel. They shall indeed be drowned
And when you and those with you go on board the Ark, say, `Praise is to Allah Who delivered us from the cruel people
And say, `My Lord! Take me to a blessed destination. And You are the One to take us to the best destination
Surely indeed there are signs in this. And surely, We do put people on trial
Then We raised up after them another generation
And We sent to them a Messenger from among them to tell them, "Worship Allah! You have no god other than Him. Will you not then take heed
